website_summaries.verdict: A throwback version of the original Tamagotchi — but don’t be fooled it’s not exactly the same as the classic model.
pros: Great battery life (CR2032 battery lasts a while)
Includes the addition of a guessing game
cons: Not an exact replica of the original toy
Screen is a bit blurry, according to some consumers

customer_reviews.title: Old school fun :)
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 30 years old woman and as soon as I saw this I knew I had to buy it. It arrived quickly and in excellent condition. The Tamagotchi it’s just as I remember. The instructions are clear and the steps are easy to follow. If you want a trip down memory lane you have to buy one of this.
customer_reviews.author: gabywho

customer_reviews.title: The Tamagotchi is CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I love Tamagotchi! Fact: Tamagotchi is the coolest thing of all time, and it hasn't changed even after all this time. You guys, it's about happiness... You see it's a combination of digital and real (the software and the egg shaped casing). Until we have full blown VR the novelty will still be there. It's very ambitious when you think about it. They have simulated a living creature, and effectively. It moves by itself, responds, grows. What is the purpose of the game? What is the value of the egg shaped encasement? it's to appreciate it, it's happiness you guys.
customer_reviews.author: salve

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: wow, this is worth buying, it brings back memories from when I had them as little and has some improvements like better responsive buttons and runs faster in playing the game.
customer_reviews.author: Hernan Marrero

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tamagotchi!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so amazing to have a Tamagotchi that resembles the ones I had during childhood! This mermaid tamagotchi is so pretty! The mermaid design is only on the front but the back of the shell is a shimmery clear that just pulls it all together. I felt like the screen was a bit darker than the original but compared to the one I had 20 years ago the screen is actually brighter! (Added a picture with my 20 year old tama for screen comparison.)
customer_reviews.author: SubCreation

customer_reviews.title: Blast from the past!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter came to me one day and asked me for a Tamagatchi for her upcoming birthday. I thought, “wow that sounds SO familiar!!” Sure enough, it’s the same thing from when we were in high school...the little gigapet that needs constant care and beeps constantly LOL! Anyway for what it’s worth, these things are kind of expensive (to me), but it’s a nice blast from the past!
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.C.

customer_reviews.title: As Great as I remember
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old, as I have fond memories of a keychain full of tamagotchis and other virtual pets from my childhood back in 1998. She LOVES it. The tech is so old but she likes it better than any of her tablet pet games. I even find myself "babysitting" so I can play with it. Very nostalgic , I recommend if you have a kid that would be into this sort of thing, or you yourself would like to take a trip back to the late 90s.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Perrotta

customer_reviews.title: Hairy electronic toys.
customer_reviews.text: Build is not very good. In my copy there was hair (eyelash) under varnish. It cannot be removed without damaging the surface. Bandai's quality is disgusting. Amazon solved my problem by compensating for the shipping cost, which is almost 2 times higher than the cost of the toy itself - $ 33.94. Amazon's solution completely suits me, because the return cost for me would be $ 102, but you can't sell hairy toys to children, Bandai. In any case, I am a loser, because I don’t know how to present such a toy now. Package was factory sealed. Thank you, Bandai!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandr

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love tamagotchis. I have a Tama P and a Tama Friends. I also still have an old tamagotchi from the 90s that still works. I adore having this one. I give it 5 stars and go Bandai! Thanks for bringing these back!! I've seen some confusion with the date on the back. They were rel-released in Japan in 2017. It takes a bit for them to be translated into English and released here which is why they say 2017 on the back vs. 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Works just like when I was a kid
customer_reviews.text: I've had my tamagotchi for a few weeks now and it works perfectly. But, my advise to you is hit the reset button right after activating your pet. I didn't do that and my game glitched a couple of times making my pet "go home" after only 3 days. Resetting it fixed it though. So I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sofiya

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive the Galaxy color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this one and paid more for it because the galaxy color was what was wanted. Even asked the question of what color would be received and everyone answered it would be the galaxy color. When the box arrived it was the black one. Item is being returned due to paying more for it thinking that would be the color we got.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Insane time to hatch and wake up
customer_reviews.text: It takes TOO long (HOURS) to hatch the egg and to wake up from naps that it make almost impossible to play with it after school or after summer camp hours before time to sleep of my kid. Before it hatch or wake up, you can’t play nothing with the tamagotchi. Also, it needs more brightness. It’s too difficult to look at the tamagotchi and the small icons. Also the buttons are too small to hit. Too pricey for the same old tamagotchi. The only nice thing is that it is a toy from my childhood but it doesn’t worth for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mariarosario

customer_reviews.title: Love tamagotchis!
customer_reviews.text: It’s like the ones from my childhood. Gen 2 (P2) characters. You can feed them, play, take care... use it as a watch/clock.
customer_reviews.author: Nazario

customer_reviews.title: I guess it worked out great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a sort of nostalgic gift for my wife. And the problem is, she loves it. She spends more time with 'Tommy', as she has named him, than our actual dog that is dying for her attention. I kind of like Tommy more too, because I don't ever have to clean up Tommy's dookies.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Fun but disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: It satisfied my nostalgia but you'll put this thing down after an hour, forever, if you're an adult. They could have put more than one game in, and the game takes zero thought. Our expectations grow as we do and this product just didn't grow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazun Custumer

customer_reviews.title: So very cute.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. I love tamagotchi ! Especially cute new patterns. I want them all
customer_reviews.author: Natalie V. Galasso

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you compare prices, Some sellers overcharge
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it, however, I paid about three times more than B&N sells them for. It’s just really disappointing to realize how much I was overcharged. Especially since I bought 2 of them. SMH...
customer_reviews.author: Brandi H

customer_reviews.title: Fun and nostalgic
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED Tamagotchis as a kid! If you want a shot of nostalgia, pick this up. They're super cute and fun to play around with. I didn't have any problems with the screen brightness personally. Keep in mind these things can get annoying after awhile with the beeping, if you don't remember that part from your childhood, haha, I finally understand why my parents disliked them --- my little pixel monster is a hungry guy and he never shuts up!
customer_reviews.author: Karli

customer_reviews.title: Just Like the 90s
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the 90s version I had as a kid. Love it. Be warned though, the screen is dim and you need good lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Schnapp

customer_reviews.title: In love with my blast from the past
customer_reviews.text: Arrived same day. Blazing fast! I haven't pulled the tab out of the back yet. I got the rainbow one on launch day, decided I needed the galaxy one too since the Gen 1s have different Tamas from the Gen 2s. I'm going to wait until tomorrow to start this one. 😊 I like that the back of the galaxy one is sparkly purple
customer_reviews.author: Sairz

customer_reviews.title: Dies for no reason
customer_reviews.text: Not happy. Starts out ok but it dies every time once it hits 3 days old. It has full happiness, full stomach, good discipline, isnt sick, yet without fail every night at 745pm at the age of 3 it dies. I am not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Gadget We Love It!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY happy I took a chance and got this for my 8-year-old for Christmas! He ended up loving it as much as I thought he would! Funny story, after trying to watch a movie with me while having his pet beeping in the background for attention, he told me that now he knows how I, and all parents, feel with kids always beeping I mean screaming for attention. Lol good, let him learn some empathy! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Happehness

customer_reviews.title: Its back and in a cuter shell than ever
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to have one of these again, the shell is cute & the gameplay is as I remember. Screen seems darker than it was before (I had a tamagotchi v4 as a kid) but that could just be my memory failing me. If they make a version were you can connect with friends it'll be absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, if you’re 9
customer_reviews.text: I don’t get it but, I bought it for my 9 yo daughter & she thought she’d won the lottery! It does what it says it will & she loved it, until it went through the wash. If you wash & dry it, it will no longer work, but for that moment, it was amazing (according to a 9 yo!).
customer_reviews.author: chinamommy

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Tiny bit smaller then the original gen 1 maybe normal for gen 2? Never had a gen 2 before this so giving it 5 stars for working perfectly and having tons of different tamagotchis. It is bigger than the mini if anyone is wondering.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my tamagotchi for the past 20 days, and I will keep using it for the forseable future. Back when I was young I couldn't afford a REAL one so after 20 years I can say it's worth it. It's exactly as you remember them, It's a vpet in your pocket that you care for. If you find it too overwhelming pause it (A+C simultaneously in the clock), If the sound annoys you mute it (A+C in the main window). If you feel you want it, buy it. If you want to buy it for a child, go ahead it's less responsability then a dog.
customer_reviews.author: Tiago

customer_reviews.title: Tamagotchi is back!
customer_reviews.text: 20 years later--so glad these finally came back to USA! Item arrived quickly, well packaged and new, sealed in box. Haven't opened it yet but I assume it is fine. Disregard the previous comment from the other reviewer, as these replica versions are almost completely identical to the older models in every way. If you want a healthy 'good' character, don't feed them any snacks!
customer_reviews.author: Error 707

customer_reviews.title: Felt a rush of childhood
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, when I opened the box and saw this, I felt a phantom rush of childhood excitement. It felt sugary and carefree and ah! What a great feeling. It's exactly as I remembered the one I had in '98, and it worked great! Though, that ended up being the problem, that it worked. Maybe I liked how needy this pet was as a kid, but as an adult, that is THE LAST thing I want in my life. I just waited until the pet was happy and put it on pause and it's been living as a key chain ever since. Still gets a 5 stars because the product is exactly as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren O.M.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I dont even want to give a 1 star. It is completely horrible. The egg would flash for a minute and then lines appear and shuts off. I would try to reset and kept doing the same thing. I'm very disappointed that I recieved a piece of crap that I was excited to get.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Original Tamagotchi! Such a throwback.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Just like the original. Feeding, Disipline, Number Game just like my daughter remembers. Came very nice and snug in the packaging. So fun! Gorgeous shell color. Hopefully I'll be purchasing another for my daughter soon!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to see screen without a bright light
customer_reviews.text: I dont remember this being an issue when i was middle school, but i bought this to be Nostalgic and literally couldn’t see what i was doing because the screen has not backlight and/or the pixels that are darker than compromise the interface were not stark enough to see. Either way, i had to be in very bright lighting or put a light directly on it to see it. Really took the fun out of it and really dont use it because i can’t see what i am doing generally. Very cute item though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessaraea

customer_reviews.title: Short lived
customer_reviews.text: Not at all the color described and ordered. However my daughter save to get and like any impatient 8yr old didn't want to wait longer for a replacement. Tips to parent: unless you are OK with caring for inanimate object don't not waste the money. My daughter and friends player with them for the break and either lost them or tossed them once school reopened.
customer_reviews.author: S. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shell. The buttons are kind of hard to press but it’s not a big deal. It’s also super loud! But you can easily turn the sound on and off. Smooth graphics, no lag. Feels sturdy and not like it’s going to break if you squeeze it a little too hard. Can’t wait to see my little Tama grow up! This is my first classic Tama since I was a kid. I’ve only had color Tamas as an adult so far, so it’s definitely an adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Monica S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of being a kid.... Except a can't keep the darn thing alive. It was a lot easier when I could just play with it and not have to go to work or adult.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Morales

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: Update: we changed the battery and it still doesnt work. So got this for my daughter for christmas. We open it, remove the tab, and it keeps turning off on us before we can even set the time. I have tried to reset it but no luck. I plan to replace the battery just so we can see if that fixes the problem. Huge inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Chrusciel

customer_reviews.title: Brings back memories
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter (6 yrs old) thinking she’d LOVE it because she likes little electronic games/gadgets and I used to be obsessed with mine growing up. She didn’t quite understand how it worked and in the process of showing her I kind of took it on as my own haha still as fun and pointless as I remember. Ahhhhh childhood memories.....
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay4186

customer_reviews.title: fun, but noisy
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my 11yr old's easter basket.she liked but was midly annoyed by the constant beeping when the pet needed to be fed, played with, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Haack

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia for days!
customer_reviews.text: Oh the nostalgia! I absolutely had to get one of these when I saw the amazing price! I got one for my sister for Christmas too! I love that they use the original software from the 90’s, but with new and improved outsides! I’m so excited to open this and play with it! Definitely an amazing gift for any 90’s baby or even the newer generation! Hours of fun and better than owning a real pet sometimes!
customer_reviews.author: Therese

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Just like it was like to use back in the day.
customer_reviews.author: JGD

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working a month after we bought it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 10 year old. She could have really cared less. These kids today with their fancy Switch and DS! lol they dont appreciate the time it takes to raise these things. I bought it for the nostalgia. I thought she would like it but anyway she didnt really play with it and then I picked it up one day to see that it was stuck on the bounding egg startup screen and the other buttons would not work. I tried to reset it and that didnt help. This is why they used to give these out for free in Happy Meals. They are not quality products. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: leeann

customer_reviews.title: dim acreen
customer_reviews.text: my screen so dim. i have to tilt to be able to see. i changed the battery with a brand new one, if tested the voltage and still dim screen. works well. but not fun when you can see the screen that well. very sad. oh also the buttons dont always work. you have to press very hard and slowly to work
customer_reviews.author: Joe Max

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic feeling, that's all
customer_reviews.text: Cute but my son is already tired of it beeping all the time. It would die every 4 to 5 days. The game is boring and there is no strategy to it. Just guess which way the thing is going to turn and keep playing until its happy the majority of the time. It was pretty cool seeing one of these again after so long. But for all it can do its really overpriced. Just get a talking tom app to play for free... a lot more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia at its finest - not really for young kids
customer_reviews.text: I got this gift for a 5-year old. I remember the Tamagotchi craze, but I didn't have one myself, so that explains why I didn't remember how difficult it is. Overall, the product itself is great. It comes with an instruction manual on how to take care of the pet and how to play games with it and everything. But it's all very complicated depending on the age range. The 5-year old I purchased this for received it on Christmas, and now, a few days later, she doesn't even know where it is. Honestly, I played with it more than she did. It's a great gift, but for the right age range!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: My son was obsessed with this thing for days. My only complaint is the darn alien keeps leaving because my son can’t keep the alien satisfied no matter how many times he feeds it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: I love this but there's only one problem with it.
customer_reviews.text: So I got this for me and my niece like a couple months back. On here's everything works and sounds good, but on mines the screen is a bit faded and the sounds isn't so good. I got the insurance so maybe I'll see if they can help me out with it. Other then that everything is good. I'll write another review to see if they helped me. But I have to say they're amazing though. My niece loves her's so much she won't let hers go
customer_reviews.author: Butterflygamer88

customer_reviews.title: I want more!
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cute I’ve never really owned this version of the tamagotchi so I’m happy to finally have one. My first tama was the tamagotchi connection v2 and that’s when my obsession started as a child. The sound is pretty loud so you can really hear it when it’s crying and the lcd screen is nothing too special. I made it a little cozy to keep it safe. Anyways, I recommend it to anyone that wants to own a cute little friend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C.

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love - Battery issues
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it, but had battery issues and always died by 4 no matter how you cared for it.
customer_reviews.author: JOSH CAULDER

customer_reviews.title: Not for today’s kids
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t easy for kids who are used to regular screens. The screen is hard to see and the buttons are not easy to read. I’d suggest the new generation of this for younger kids
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Hart

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: It is EXACTLY like I remember it from when I was a kid!! It's perfect and worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: SKNik

customer_reviews.title: Blast from the past!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t resist buying this, as these were all the rage when I was a kid. It’s just like I remember!
customer_reviews.author: amigcoffee

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Great Packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for me and my roommate, and its been so much fun! It really brings us back to our childhoods! They arrived in a box with plenty of cushion, and nothing was damaged at all. Very satisfied with the product as well as the shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Jenkins Skorupski

customer_reviews.title: Just like the original, it's still pretty neat!
customer_reviews.text: Just like I remember when they first came out when I was a kid. My daughter, she's 8, loves hers. I for got how funny they are, they have little attitudes. My son, he's 6 hates taking care of his! He doesn't want us to reset it because he has to take care of it! My daughter loves hers though! It's not cheap, it's well made and a great little gift!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Take me back to my childhood, boy now I actually own one of my own instead of borrowing a friends lol! Love it! It’s exactly how I remember them. I got one for my daughter too, she loves it! You guys are the best!!!! I need more haha
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like the tama I grew up with!
customer_reviews.text: This tamagotchi is just like the ones I had 20 years ago! I really like the colorful shell of this rainbow one but wished it had a bit of sparkle to it, still pretty and super neat none the less!
customer_reviews.author: SubCreation

customer_reviews.title: Great collection item!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been collecting Tamagotchi’s since early this year and was super excited for these new releases! The glitter red shell is gorgeous and is a nice addition to the collection. While these rereleases aren’t quite as solid quality as the originals, it’s still a fun and very similar experience to the original 90’s gotchi’s. I’m hoping there will be Connections rereleases or even color model releases in the US after these!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Carter

customer_reviews.title: Bad condition
customer_reviews.text: There was no pull tag on the device therefore it had been on for god knows how long. There was an angel on the screen so I knew it had been on/started before purchasing. Also when pushing the buttons it makes a strange noise.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: totally worth it. Blast from the past!
customer_reviews.text: This is just like I remember! Throwback to when I was 10 years old!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item. The character dies overnight and you have to keep starting over. None of the ones we have had in the past were like this. My son said it wasn’t even worth playing with if it was going to die every night. Idk if it was a malfunction of the one I received, but I didn’t bother to try a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: 90’s kids will like it, today’s kids won’t
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to figure out and the kids (6&8) struggle with making the pet happy. Definitely looking forward to the updated version
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Hart

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be great because I remember having this as a kid. So, I thought it would be fun to try it out as an adult. Well, I had it a week and the buttons already won’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Koons

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected. Packaging was slightly wrinkled, but that is to be expected. No visible damage on the tamagotchi, a bit smaller than expected, and it worked perfectly. Overall, I'd say it's a pretty good tamagotchi!
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo Garcia Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Fulfilling my childhood dreamz!
customer_reviews.text: when i was a kid i always wanted one of these. now i have one and i love it!
customer_reviews.author: Casondra B

customer_reviews.title: Great and Nostalgic
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I purchased mine from Amazon, seeing as no stores near me were carrying these limited edition Tamagotchis. The print is alright, it's a little pixelated but nothing to worry about. The screen is a little dimmer than I'm used to but I just chalk that up to factory batteries. Definitely would recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Just as I remembered!
customer_reviews.text: Just as I remembered! It’s fun to have a little nostalgia with this little friend! Cute! Will share with my kids!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Sidler

customer_reviews.title: It's back!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excied for this product!! I was born in the mid 90's, so tamagotchis were all the rage. I will edit this review when my pet arrives today!!!
customer_reviews.author: MrowPika24

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I had these when I was a teenager and now my teenagers have one. They love it! Takes me back. One daughter is scared to start hers. Afraid she will kill it. 😁 Great shipping time too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the time to actually take a look and play with it yet, but it is just like the Giga pets I used to have growing up. I bought it as a birthday gift for my daughter. It has died already so I will reset it and try to work it out. She actually threw out the instructions when opening up her gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Raye Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I literally love this! I am a kid and my parents did this when they were younger. They bought me one. It’s so fun! You don’t have to always be with it, yet there is always something you can do. It’s super fun and I totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and fun for little kids but needs bigger better screen.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 and 7 year olds love it and figures out how to play very easily. This simple programming is great and the options are sufficient for little kids. I wish the screen is bigger so that it won’t be hard to see at times. It’s a classic but can still put in some upgrades such as bigger better screen. It’s 2018 already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish you had your old tamogatchi back???
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what you think it is! Your old tamogatchi! I couldn’t help myself! It’s perfect and I even bought a few extras as gifts. I’ve been using it for a few weeks and it works perfectly! Great job with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Pia P.

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: I grew up having a tamagotchi and my daughter was very excited of getting one for Christmas. We finally opened it and the egg is still hatching. You can’t even press any buttons. I’ve reset it a couple of times already and it’s just the egg.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I loved these as a kid in the 90s so when I found out from graveyardgirl aka bunny from youtube I had to get one again I have not ment to but killed it a few times so if takin a break from it for a bit lol
customer_reviews.author: Hollen Freeman

customer_reviews.title: No fun if you can’t see anything
customer_reviews.text: Can’t even see the screen. I knew it wasn’t backlit but the little creature barely showed up and the colored background was so dark you really couldn’t see at all. I guess it worked ok but how could we tell if we couldn’t even see it? No fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money for such an obnoxious toy
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like it would be a great gift, but the first day of owning it my daughter had to lock it in a closet because it goes off loudly all hours of the day. The screen is very difficult to read, and did not live up to the hype in the description. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Sooo much 90’s :-)
customer_reviews.text: Brand spanking new, and made by Bandai, the OEM for these little computerized gems. These were the first of their time before the #metoo ones came. A simple game with a cute concept of maintaining a virtual pet. These will take you back to the golden age of the 90’s!
customer_reviews.author: Mark J.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love em...however
customer_reviews.text: One of the two ordered showed up apparently used a little. The tab disabling the battery was pulled and game already running. No issues functionality wise, easy enough to reset, so only one star deducted (more for the seller than the product).
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Tama Everything??
customer_reviews.text: Has the majority of all the features it came with years ago. But you can't earn coins anymore playing the game. And if I remember correctly there was 2 games included and a little shop as well. Where you can buy various food and desserts for your pet. My pets currently 9rs old, hope theres generations added as well. And Tama Town, are they bringing that back too? Other than that a good product. I hope they come out with more versions in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Just as I remember!
customer_reviews.text: Just as I remembered from childhood! My daughter loves it and so do I! Nothing has changed about it from yesteryear and that makes it even more priceless!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S.

customer_reviews.title: Same old great toy
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product. It was exactly like I remember it as a kid and that’s what I wanted. My 5 year old had no problem catching on. It hasn’t held his interest as much as I remember it holding mine but still been a hit at our house.
customer_reviews.author: Lall

customer_reviews.title: It is a really great way to teach a child how to care for a pet.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Tamagotchi for my nine-year-old daughter. She has really enjoyed playing with her virtual pet and it brings back old memories for me playing with one as a child. She originally was interested in the upgraded virtual Tamagotchi pet that ranges between $50 and $60. I chose to buy this one For her to be sure that she would continue playing with it. It is a really great way to teach a child how to care for a pet. I am now considering buying a set of the upgraded virtual Tamagotchi’s for her and her seven-year-old sister so they can connect and play together.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B Hart

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have "colorful characters", "majestic", and this hearts one. And this one is by far my favorite of the three colors. Looks so much better in person! I collect tamagotchis and overall this may be my favorite color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Trooper

customer_reviews.title: Fun family gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my 11yr old daughter & she loves it. The first day it beeps frequently until it grows to the next stage & then continues to get less demanding. My kiddos all take turns with feeding & playing with it to keep it happy, it’s a bit stressful for one person to deal with of the time because it will die quickly without frequent attention.
customer_reviews.author: Featherluv

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Is cute. My granddaughter loves this little thing. It is very interactive as far as wanting fed, etc. I am not sure how long it will be fun, but then I am not a child.
customer_reviews.author: June L.Cain

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, haven't used it yet but if it isn't up to par,I will update my review. It has alot of features and can't wait to see if my son will resume his responsibility to keep this alive. If he does,we promised him a "REAL" pet. So we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Just like my childhood
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my daughter and she loves it. Now I know the pain my parents endured searching for an unattended tamagotchi incessantly beeping and stuck between the couch cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea M.

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong tamagitchi
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tamagitchi for my neice's birthday. For some reason the tamagitchi I received is solid black. I'm extreamly unhappy about this. My neice is your typical girly girl and doesn't care much for the color black. But since her party is this weekend I don't have time to return it and order a different one. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with Low Battery
customer_reviews.text: Tamagotchi's are fun, but the one I ordered for my 6 year old with his birthday money arrived with a low battery. The plastic tab was still in it and we had to pull it out to turn it on, but immediately after pressing the reset button, we got the low battery symbol. Luckily, we have an assortment of lithium batteries in my house from different gadgets and toys, so I was able to quickly replace it. I'm pretty disappointed in this seller for selling electronics with low batteries.
customer_reviews.author: LK1982

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my issue with the tamagotchi
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars: My tamagotchi keeps dying on day 3 every time! It never gets pass that & I take care of it extremely well. It’s supper annoying it never gets to leave the baby stage WTH! Updated: I opened it and remove and reinstalled the batteries and my 3rd new tamagotchi made it to day 4 lol!
customer_reviews.author: Monesia McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Photo
customer_reviews.text: Product sent is not the product pictured. I received a purple English version, whereas the white Japanese version is pictured
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and pretty
customer_reviews.text: The Paradise is the most beautiful out of the whole series. The only complaint is I can't see the screen clearly because of the wave-like static background. Wish I could remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: The buttons wouldn’t work and it would randomly restart itself. It would really upset my daughter who loved it but couldn’t get it to work. I replaced it once, then gave up on the second one.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Child hood memories
customer_reviews.text: So I grew up playing with this toy it was very popular everyone had to have and not just one lots. I got to bring back childhood memories and it did. It was fun then and still to this day.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Why?
customer_reviews.text: Why did we think this was fun when we were younger? I have real animals to take care of that don’t require as much attention as this key chain. Product as described. Ours had already been handed back to us from the children as it is too needy and now I am a tick taking care of digital pets as well as real ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Memories
customer_reviews.text: Just like I remember as a kid. My niece wanted one for xmas and I got it for her. Showed her how everything works and she loves it and hates it since she needs to take care of it all the time lol. Works great and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sauieh Noushin

customer_reviews.title: Love the Mermaid shell!
customer_reviews.text: Such a pretty, and more feminine tama. Love the fact that they brought these back. A childhood memory and now a collector’s item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you want a job for yourself...
customer_reviews.text: Still unsure about this. Glad we bought the larger one. My 6 year old picked it up, hatched the egg, and left it on the floor. I now feel obligated the carry the dang thing in my pocket to assure the pixelated guy survives. I didn’tive the idea when I was a kid, so unsure why I thought my little guy would.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bergel

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size, it functions exactly as you expect. The buttons can feel weak at some times, but this is a common tamagotchi issue.
customer_reviews.author: tenn

customer_reviews.title: Oldie and Goodie
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my younger brother so he could experience some of the toys from the glory days and it’s exactly how I remember them. It’s a newly manufactured product with everything you loved from the old days.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Exactly as advertised. A personal note... it is SO ANNOYING. It's just a cute key-chain at this point. As an adult, there isn't enough time in the day to keep these animals alive with the attention they need.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren O.M.

customer_reviews.title: Only lived for about 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: The sound died after 2 weeks. My Tamagotchi does not beep at all anymore. So I have to guess when to look at the device and care for my virtual pet. My nostalgia died along with the speaker of this device.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia Overload!
customer_reviews.text: Who remembers Tamagochi? 1997? I had one of these as a kid. Didn't know they made a comeback! I had to get one! Nostalgia overload! 😍 They have 2 generations. This is Gen 2. They have different tamagotchi characters for each generation.
customer_reviews.author: RetroWave

product_meta.title: Tamagotchi Electronic Game, Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:GameCelebrate the 20th anniversary of Tamagotchi with the original digital pet you love! feed it, clean up after it, and just take care of it! it's that simple! just like the original, these digital pets will bring back old childhood memories and is a perfect introduction to newer users of today! includes the CR2032 battery and attaches to your bag so it goes everywhere!
feature_bullets: The Original Tamagotchi digital pet you loved back in 1997 is back with the original programming!

Feed it, turn lights on/off, play with it, give it medicine, flush after it’s used the bathroom, check it’s health and discipline your Tamagotchi if he bothers you when he’s happy, fed and all cleaned up
Includes character game where you have to guess which way the Tamagotchi will move next!
Raise your Tamagotchi from egg to child to adult and how you take care of it will decide which of the 7 adults you’ll get
Comes with 1 Tamagotchi on a chain to take with you everywhere! batteries are required and comes with your Tamagotchi (CR2032)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,938 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
